ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Ludic is a lightweight framework for building HTML pages with a component-based
approach similar to React. It leverages Python's t-strings (template strings) for
type-safe HTML generation and integrates with htmx for dynamic web development
with minimal JavaScript. Features include composable components, async support,
automatic escaping for security, and CSS theming capabilities.
about.summary: Lightweight framework for building dynamic HTML pages in pure Python using t-strings

about.description:
Ludic is a lightweight framework for building HTML pages with a component-based
approach similar to React. It leverages Python's t-strings (template strings) for
type-safe HTML generation and integrates with htmx for dynamic web development
with minimal JavaScript. Features include composable components, async support,
automatic escaping for security, and CSS theming capabilities.
about.summary: Lightweight framework for building dynamic HTML pages in pure Python using t-strings

name: ludic
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: ludic
  version: "1.0.1"
  python_min: "3.14"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2f4797c02c7b56560f5b8a7241ba57c63ca8877c2720ddc9177193c7c815858c

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script:
    - python -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - pip
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - typing_extensions >=4.9.0

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - ludic
      pip_check: true
      python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/getludic/ludic
  summary: Lightweight framework for building dynamic HTML pages in pure Python using t-strings
  description: |
    Ludic is a lightweight framework for building HTML pages with a component-based
    approach similar to React. It leverages Python's t-strings (template strings) for
    type-safe HTML generation and integrates with htmx for dynamic web development
    with minimal JavaScript. Features include composable components, async support,
    automatic escaping for security, and CSS theming capabilities.
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENCE
  documentation: https://getludic.dev/docs/
  repository: https://github.com/getludic/ludic

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - claydugo
